name: Aurélien Lemesle
body:
Hi, my name is Aurélien Lemesle _"O-ray-liːn Luh-may-luh"_, not really easy to pronunce I guess.   I'm a french student in IT/computer science in [Epitech](http://www.epitech.eu/) (European Institute of Technology) based in Paris area. As part of my 5 years program with Epitech (bachelor & master), I also studied for one year IT & Management at [Jönköping University](http://hj.se/en.html) in Sweden.   More recently I worked in freelance with the startup [TVShow Time](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/tvshow-time-tv-guide-for-tv/id431065232?mt=8), updating their iOS projects for iPhone/iPad devices (~4000 weekly downloads). I really liked iPad development, it is really demanding in term of conception and attention to details. Now I'm discovering the [Swift Language](https://developer.apple.com/swift/), XCode 6 and I'm looking to join another great project. ## Experience ### iOS Software Engineer [@Airtag](http://airtag.com/)   I took part in the development of french mobile shopping iPhone apps: [Diadiscount](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/diadiscount/id790280731?mt=8), [Coccishop](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/coccishop/id819194884?mt=8), [Carrefour Express](https://itunes.apple.com/be/app/mon-express/id583358706?l=fr&mt=8). Building and turning the user interface and experience of those applications in the iOS 7 trends. Technologies used : XCode 5, Interface Builder, HockeyApp. (November 2013 - March 2014) ### Ruby on Rails Full Stack developer

  After discovering this great framework, I started working for startup which service to collect e-commerce bills and customer data on a platform to regroup promo codes, discounts, details of expenditure. With a senior developer I learned how to use Heroku, Selenium web driver, AWS SDK for Ruby, how to build and improve an API and how to process background jobs.

  Then with the startup Reunik, I worked on a facebook application enabling the automated creation of photo stories from Facebook and other social networks, using different technologies such as MongoDB, Redis, Facebook Graph API, CoffeeScript, Haml/Sass.

(October 2011 - August 2012) ### Web technologies Teaching Assistant [@Sup'internet](http://supinternet.fr/)   I was a teaching assistant for students in bachelor program of a pioneering school belonging to [IONIS Education Group](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IONIS_Education_Group). Helping them learning how to use PHP, SQL, HTML, CSS. (September 2011 - July 2012) ## Education ### Epitech - European Institute of Technology * Bachelor’s degree of Information Technology (awarded in the year 2013). * Master of Information Technology in Software Engineering (2015 expected). ### Jönköping University   I was an exchange student for 2 semesters in Sweden and followed a master of Information Technology and Management in Jönköping tekniska högskolan (August 2012 – June 2013). ## Skills * Objective-C * iOS Development * Interface Builder * C * C++ * Ruby * Ruby on Rails ## Interests * Software development * Project Management * Agile Methods * New Technologies * Travelling ## Languages * French (native proficiency) * English (Professional working proficiency) * Swedish (Elementary proficiency) ## Contact & links * [Send me an email](mailto:lemesle.aurelien@gmail.com) * [My Linkedin](http://www.linkedin.com/in/aurelienlemesle/en) * [Google+](http://google.com/+AurélienLemesle) * [Follow me on Twitter](https://twitter.com/MrRerel) * [My Resume (.pdf)](http://cl.ly/W5xe) * [Mon CV en français (.pdf)](http://cl.ly/U7Bi) * Skype : lemesle.aurelien
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
